scripts.server:kill: bash -lc 'PORT=${HUDES_PORT:-10001}; PIDS=$(lsof -ti :$PORT || true); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then echo Killing stale PIDs on $PORT: $PIDS; kill -9 $PIDS || true; fi; sleep 0.5'
scripts.test:e2e: HUDES_PORT=10001 HUDES_SPEED_RUN_SECONDS=5 npm run -s server:kill && playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:ui: HUDES_PORT=10001 HUDES_SPEED_RUN_SECONDS=5 npm run -s server:kill && playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:chromium: HUDES_PORT=10001 HUDES_SPEED_RUN_SECONDS=5 npm run -s server:kill && playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test:frontend: npm run -s test:unit && npm run -s test:e2e:chromium
